author: HuguesBrun
body:
This PR is the backport of PR #9102 in 74X 

It is aimed to update the list of the muon paths monitored by the offline DQM.
The parsing of the filters monitored is also updated to be able to also monitor the L1 filters (useful for L1 passthrough)
title: update the list of the muon path monitored in Offline Muon DQM (backport in 74X)
